backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types and data models for bookings, providers, rentals, user profiles, and related enums, with comparison utilities for sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Records feature evidence identifying the removal of the Admin button from the site header and the impacted file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that mounts the React app and loads the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with all routes for services, bookings, profile, provider flows, rentals, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied card with an alert icon and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication state with retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireLogi: Gatekeeper component that shows a login prompt unless the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Renders a status badge with label and variant based on booking status.
Simple brand logo component rendering the text EYEGIC with responsive header and default variants.
frontend/src/components/forms/Availabili: Date selector supporting single or range mode with time inputs and formatted output via onChange.
frontend/src/components/forms/MobileNumb: Handles mobile input, validates number, triggers OTP flow, and submits only after verification.
frontend/src/components/forms/MockOtpVer: Mock 4‑digit OTP generator and verifier with resend, loading state, and success display.
frontend/src/components/forms/OptionalPh: Optional image uploader with preview and remove support, emitting selected file changes.
frontend/src/components/forms/RepairIssu: Checkbox-based multi-select for repair issue types, updating selected values.
frontend/src/components/icons/WhatsAppIc: SVG component rendering a WhatsApp icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/header/Ad: Dropdown control showing admin notifications count and linking to the admin notifications page.
frontend/src/components/layout/header/My: Profile menu for authenticated users with view profile and logout actions, supporting desktop and mobile variants.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Page wrapper applying max-width, title, and description before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/layout/RootLayou: Root layout with header, outlet-rendered content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with navigation links, contact actions, and build info display.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Site header with navigation, login/logout handling, contact dropdown, and mobile menu logic.
frontend/src/components/profile/FrameSha: SVG icon components representing various eyeglass frame shapes.
Checkbox-based selector allowing users to choose one or more eyeglass frame shapes.
frontend/src/config/buildInfo.ts: Exports a build identifier string sourced from environment variables.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useMobileNumber: Fetches mobile number verification logs when an admin is authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useIsCallerAdmin: Determines whether the current caller has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useBooking.t: Fetches a single booking by ID using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateOpt: Creates an optician booking and invalidates customer booking queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRen: Creates a rental booking and refreshes customer bookings afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRep: Creates a repair booking and invalidates related booking queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCustomerB: Retrieves all bookings for the logged‑in customer.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useGetBookin: Fetches booking details for a given booking ID.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useLogMobile: Logs a mobile number verification event through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useProviderB: Fetches bookings assigned to a service provider.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useUpdateBoo: Updates a booking’s status and invalidates multiple related queries.
Empty placeholder hook for site logo logic.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useCallerUser: Fetches the logged‑in user’s profile and exposes loading and fetched flags.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useProfileCom: Retrieves the user’s profile completion percentage if authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useProfilePic: Mutations to update profile or prescription pictures and refresh profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useSaveCaller: Saves the authenticated user’s profile and refreshes related queries.
Provides hooks to fetch a provider for the logged‑in identity and to onboard a new provider using react‑query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/rentals/useRentalCata: Fetches the rental catalog from the backend via the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/routing/useIsHomeRout: Determines if the current normalized pathname represents the home route and logs diagnostics in development.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider with login, logout, identity persistence, and related state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode styles, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNotificati: Admin page displaying mobile number verification logs with access control and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/BookingDetai: Displays detailed information for a specific booking, including type, status, pricing, and service-specific fields with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/mobile-optic: Presents confirmation details for a mobile optician booking, including status, service info, and user contact data.
Guides users through a multi‑step flow to create a mobile optician booking, including mobile verification, service selection, form input, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Shows a logged-in user's list of bookings with key details, statuses, and navigation to individual booking pages.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/rentals/Rent: Displays confirmation and details for a completed eyewear rental booking, including fees, address, and navigation options.
Allows users to book a rental item by selecting rental duration, entering delivery details, viewing calculated pricing, and submitting the booking.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/repairs/Repa: Displays confirmation details for a submitted repair booking, loading the booking by ID and handling invalid, loading, and error states.
Collects user info, repair issues, and address to create a repair booking, including OTP verification and form submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with service selection, mobile number OTP verification flow, and navigation to service routes.
frontend/src/pages/profile/MyProfilePage: Allows users to view and edit their profile, including personal details, frame preferences, and uploading profile or prescription pictures.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderDash: Shows provider profile and assigned bookings, allowing providers to update booking statuses and access onboarding if unregistered.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderOnbo: Handles provider registration with validation, phone/email verification, service area entry, service selection, and onboarding submission.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalItemDet: Displays detailed information for a rental item, including pricing, availability, and features, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalsCatalo: Shows a searchable and filterable catalog of rental items with availability indicators and navigation to item details.
frontend/src/pages/services/MobileOptici: Presents the mobile optician service with features, imagery, and a booking button.
Introduces the eyewear rental service with benefits, imagery, and a link to browse the catalog.
Describes eyewear repair services, listing available repairs and providing a booking link.
frontend/src/pages/settings/BrandingLogo: Empty file placeholder for branding logo settings.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides helper functions to format numbers as INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/homeOtpSession.ts: Manages session storage for home-flow OTP verification and associated mobile numbers.
frontend/src/utils/logoDataUrl.ts: Empty utility file placeholder for logo data URL handling.
frontend/src/utils/profileCompletionMock: Returns a fixed mock profile completion percentage for testing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides validation and sanitization for phone numbers, emails, and PIN codes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, themes, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking versions, features, and requests for the Eyegic project.
